lyrics.text:
Ko e kakai kuo liliu,
‘I he Laumālie;
Ke tau hiva fakataha,
Pea fakafeta’i.

Tau hiva, pea kalanga,
‘I he fiefia;
Pea fakaongo atu,
‘A hotau ‘Otua.

Ke tau fai ‘a e pole’o
Tau le’o, mo Sīsū,
Pea tau tokanga hake,
Ki he maama lelei.

Pea tali teuteu atu,
Hotau laumālie;
Ki he maama ‘i ‘olunga
‘Oku ‘aho ma’u pē.
